JobTitle: Sr Product Manager - Opportunity for Working Remotely
JobFullDesc: Business SummaryVMware is looking for a Product Line Manager to join End User Computing Business Unit (EUCBU) product team with a specific focus on expanding our UEM product for Windows.  VMware customers are increasingly adopting VMware UEM with Workspace ONE.The UEM Product Management team of EUCBU is chartered with providing customers with the ability to manage all platforms through a ubiquitous set of controls that match today’s modern management requirements. You will be part of an action-oriented team that has a culture of open communication, empowerment, innovation, teamwork, and customer delight. We are looking for someone with a strong understanding of Windows, and Windows Management, along with the drive and desire to define and evangelize the set of features and solutions that will support VMware Workspace ONE’s growth.Given the current state of the program, we are looking for an experienced Product Manager that thrives and excels in the growth phase of a product, is not scared of competition, complexity, and is truly passionate about solving customer problems.Job Role and Responsibilities As a Product Line Manager, you will be a senior member of the Product team and in charge of product definition, roadmap, and direction of WS1 UEMs features. You will work cross-functionally with user experience, engineering, marketing, sales, and customer success to create innovative services.You will be responsible for customer and market research that you will use to define the strategy for your area of responsibility and present that strategy to internal stakeholders and customers. This may include defining product-market fit and market sizing.You will produce a clear MVP definition and roadmap and working collaboratively with engineering to execute on it through proper prioritization.You will work to bring the customer and their needs closer to the development team through research, customer engagements and involving customers in the incremental progress of the evolving product.You will partner with users, customers, and account teams to facilitate successful customer proof of concept deployments.You will present technical presentations to customers, partners, and the field, and gather feedback to influence product and solution offerings.Required Skills6+ years of experience as a product manager, product marketing manager, technical marketing manager, systems engineer or customer solution architect.Able to breakdown complex problems into simple solutionsObsess about customers, users, and their needsPassionate technologist, ready to evangelize within and outside of VMwareExperience working with and understanding the needs of End Users and the management of their devices – cradle to grave.Good technical skills and comfortable in front of internal solutions architects, customers, and partners.Strong leadership and communications skills, willingness to mentor othersPreferred SkillsFamiliarity with Modern management offerings and experience with delivering cloud-based services highly desirable.Understanding of agile software development methodologies and tools. Strong propensity to drive for results as part of a high performing team.Thorough understanding of Windows management & Windows OS platformPrevious experience as an SCCM, Altiris, or Marimba administrator a plus.Category : MarketingSubcategory: Product ManagementExperience: Manager and ProfessionalFull Time/ Part Time: Full TimePosted Date: 2021-07-07VMware Company Overview: At VMware, we believe that software has the power to unlock new opportunities for people and our planet.
